showScoreExcerpt:
"A harmless comedy...The three BFFs are not so much real characters as they are stereotypical TV sitcom characters...The hardest part, Jordan Berman, becomes a buzzkill by the end of the play...Glick skillfully changes moods like a chameleon and makes the part believable...There are funny and touching moments in 'Significant Other'...Thanks to Trip Cullmanâ€™s fast-paced, breezy and inventive direction, he keeps this otherwise obvious fluff story afloat."
